comments:
The title of the console view is not keeping up with the change in displayed console, and frequently says <terminated> while the application hasn't terminated (i.e. the red stop button is also displayed).

Steps I just used to demonstrate this:

1) Stopped running applications.

2) Cleared terminated launches (double-X button on Console view).  Console title is now Java Stack Trace Console.

3) Started an OSGi Framework application (a Jetty server).  Console displays application output, but continues to show the title Java Stack Trace Console.

4) Started a JUnit Plug-in test.  Console display test output, but continues to show the title Java Stack Trace Console.


I'm using 3.3M5, but have seen this problem with since 3.3M4.  Tested with these JREs: IBM 1.5 SR2 and SR4.

Just noticed the error log has a bunch of relevant errors; for example:

The NPE is a dup of bug 173714, which has been fixed. Still not sure what was causing the NPE, or if this is the cause of the title not being correct.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 172876 ***
